body: This theme focuses entirely on being an arcane powerhouse, thereby getting the most out of your spells. 1st-Tier Path Abilities—abundant casting, arcane endurance, eldritch breach, energy conversion, resilient arcana; 3rd-Tier Abilities—arcane metamastery, arcane potency, mythic spellpower; 6th-Tier Abilities—channel power, eldritch reciprocation.
name: Arcane Power
